title: ChildAvailability
description: An object describing the availability of the children of the leaves in a subtree.

bufferView.description: Index of a buffer view that indicates whether each child of the leaves of the subtree is available. The bitstream is a 1D boolean array that has an element for each child. If a child is available, its bit is 1, and if it is unavailable, the bit is 0. The number of elements in the array is (N ^ (subtreeDepth).

constant.description: Integer indicating whether all of the children of the leaves are available (1) or all the nodes are unavailable (0).
